participant_1.background: i'm in the army. i didn't graduate high school. my favourite food is shawarma. i live in canada.

participant_2.background: i work my parents farms. i drive a big truck and live in country. i'm an electrician. i only listen to country music.

content.text: hello, how are you today? I just got back from the army
what do you do for a living? I am in canada. what about you?
do you have any hobbies? I like shawarma. I am a army in canada
